name: [CICD] CALL - Export and create pull request with MS Teams
description: Recipe to export the manifest in the development environment and commit the package to a new GitHub branch to create a pull request.

code.name: receive_request
code.description: New call for [CICD] CALL - Export and create pull request with MS Teams

input.service_name: [CICD] CALL - Export and create pull request with MS Teams

block.name: export_download_package
block.comment: Export manifest and download the package from DEV environment.

block.name: create_branch_ref
block.comment: Create a branch reference in GitHub repository.

block.name: declare_list
block.title: Create Git Blob List list
block.comment: Create a list to hold Blob file SHA from GitHub create blob operation.

block.name: create_file_blob
block.comment: ...create a Blob reference in GitHub database.

block.name: insert_to_list
block.title: Add item to Git Blob List list
block.description: Add item to Git Blob List list
block.comment: Store the file path and SHA returned from GitHub.
For each exported asset in manifest...

block.name: commit_new_branch
block.comment: Use the blob list to create a commit for new branch.

block.name: create_pull_request
block.comment: Create a pull request and assign reviewer.

block.title: Get user
block.description: Get user in Workbot for Microsoft Teams (Custom)
